rules_text:
When Malika Khazra enters the battlefield, for each color of mana spent to cast her, conscript a Rebel. [i](Look at the top four cards of your library. Reveal a Rebel from them and put it into your hand or create a 1/1 Rebel token. Put the rest on the bottom.)[/i]
{1}{G}{U}: Copy target Rebel spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.
{1}{B}{R}: Rebels you control get +1/+0 and gain menace until end of turn.
